Faith: (spi) d6 Occult: (sma) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common
Skill Notes:
Mild Mannered: -2 Intimidation
All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Erastil (Good)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 16; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (11 points): Cleric: 1; Eldritch Knight II: 1; Eldritch Knight III: 1; Eldritch Knight: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 6 Hindrances: All Thumbs; Habit; Mild Mannered; Secret Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Cleric: Has Arcane Background (Cleric), Domain, Channel Energy, and Vow+ features
Domain: +1 Edge Points (domain)
Eldritch Knight II: Has Eldritch Strike feature
Eldritch Knight III: Has Eldritch Strike (Improved) feature
Eldritch Knight: Has Eldritch Recharge feature
Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Vow+: Has tight restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat

Armor: None Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Composite Bow (d10+d6 R12" AP 1); Guisarme (d10+d6 AP 1); Heavy Repeating Crossbow (2d8 R15" AP 2); Unarmed (d10+d0)

Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 40
Powers:
Blind: (2 PP Necr) R8" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Damage Field: (4 PP Abju) R8" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd (+2 PP 2" radius; +2 PP 2d6 damage; +4 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage as heavy weapon; +2 PP Moves effect 8"/rd)
Fear: (2 PP Necr) R8" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2, fear table +2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts Spirit-2 on Fear (Raise -4))
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP Ench) R8" Target forgets up to 30 min event (Smarts neg) after 1 min activation (+1 PP Edits memory; +2 PP Activate power as an action; +2 PP Completely removes all memory of a person, place, or thing)
Planar Binding: (8 PP Conj) R8" Summons extraplanar creature to perform service (Spirit neg)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Cleric): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +30 Power Points
Channel Energy: May cast Healing at R8"; additional targets cost 1 Power Point each
Eldritch Recharge: Raise on attack restores 1 Power Point
Eldritch Strike (Improved): May spend 2 Power Points for +2 damage
Eldritch Strike: May spend 2 Power Points for +2 attack
